title: Nemesis
desc:
Post 1322
- __Any other player who makes you draw a card by any means or inflicts you with a negative status effect becomes your **Obsession.**__
- __Anytime your **Obsession** switches to another player by any means, that player then suffers from the **Suffocated** status effect, and you see their hand.__
- Players can only have one **Obsession** at a time.
